access.title: Access & Reimbursement Analytics
access.subtitle: Our solutions are designed to answer specific questions to
access.highlightedText: define target access, secure it and pull it through

questions.text: How does payer management vary by methods and severity across channels?
What can I expect my launch access timing and trajectory to look like?
How do payers vary in their ability to control utilization?
Are there local markets where provider influence trumps payer policy?
How do I think about my access strategy by specific payer types & segments?
What is the optimal affordability range from a patient OOP standpoint?
What is the optimal channel contracting strategy that aligns with my brand strategy?
What is the optimal contracting play for a given PBM or payer?
How much downstream payer coverage can I expect with each of the big 3 PBMs?
What are the rebates my competitor is likely to offer to a specific PBM or payer?
To what extent does practice economics impact provider brand preference?
How do I flex physician targeting to maximize access pull-through at launch?
How do I optimize my reimbursement support to maximize patient acquisition?
Are there HCPs who are prescribing below expectations despite favorable access?
How do my brand's access & performance KPIs compare with other analog launches?

segmentation.title: Customer Segmentation
segmentation.subtitle: Our approach to Customer Segmentation is focused not just on observed behavior but also on
segmentation.highlightedText: the environment and ecosystem that drives the behavior

cards.title:
Patient
Journey &
Segmentation
questions: Who are my target patient groups and what is their size and profile?
What are key leverage points for my drug along on the treatment pathway?
How is patient care coordinated across different HCPs and providers?

cards.title:
HCP &
Provider
Segmentation
questions: How do my high value prescribers differ in their approach and behavior?
What are the forces and factors that drive variation in prescriber behavior?
What are the imperatives (access, education, support) to drive adoption?

cards.title:
IDN & Health
System
Archetyping
questions: How do the top health systems differ in their approach to care, organizational structure and operational maturity?
Given the observed behavior and influence profile, how do I customize the engagement strategy with my target systems?
